gershonwaru lesa handinwenne owuhuya. 22 gershonwarun athare siti masayak ho eeta wada wadi wayasathi siyalu piriminwa liyapadinchi karana ladi.+ owunge mulu ganana hathdahas pansiyayak wiya.+ 23 gershonwaru sammukha wime kudaramata pitupasin+ enam, basnahira paththe kandawuru bandagena sitiyoya. 24 gershonwarunge pelapathe* adhipathiya wuye layelge puthraya wana eliyasafya. 25 gershonwarunta+ sammukha wime kudarama ha sambandhawa thibena wagakima nam kudarama, ehi palamuweni thira redda,+ eeta udin dama thibena aawarana,+ sammukha wime kudaramata athul wana sthanaye thibena thira redda,+ 26 kudarama ha pujasanaya wata thibena maluwe thira,+ ema maluwe doratuwa sandaha thibena thiraya,+ eewaye lanu+ saha ee ha sambandha siyalu sewawan bala kiya ganimaya. 27 kohathgen amramwaru, ishhariwaru, hebronwaru ha ussiyelwaru pawathennoya.
